request_header_param.name: x-tts-access-token
request_header_param.desc: The seller access_token value from [Get Access Token](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a3292b0f40314a92d75#Get%20Access%20Token%20API), when user_type = 0. Follow this [guide](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/678e3a344ddec3030b238fa0) to get seller access_token.

request_query_param.name: app_key
request_query_param.desc: Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.

request_query_param.name: sign
request_query_param.desc: Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders.

request_query_param.name: timestamp
request_query_param.desc: Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.

request_query_param.name: shop_cipher
request_query_param.desc:
Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. 
Get by API [Get Authorization Shop](https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9?external_id=6507ead7b99d5302be949ba9)

request_body_param.name: replicate_target
request_body_param.desc: Target markets for replicating the local product.

request_body_param.name: ^region
request_body_param.desc: The new market where you want to replicate the product.

request_body_param.name: ^skus
request_body_param.desc:
The SKUs to be published in the specified market.
- Max SKUs for EU, JP, UK, US: 300
- Max SKUs for other regions: 100
Note: SKUs of all source country must be included.

request_body_param.name: ^^source_sku_id
request_body_param.desc: The ID of the SKU being replicated

request_body_param.name: ^^price
request_body_param.desc: The SKU's **local display price** shown on the product page before any discounts.

request_body_param.name: ^^^currency
request_body_param.desc: The currency. You must specify the local currency in the target market.

request_body_param.name: ^^^sale_price
request_body_param.desc:
The SKU's local display price shown on the product page before any discounts. 
Refer to Product Pricing for the allowed price ranges in each market.

request_body_param.name: ^^inventory
request_body_param.desc:
SKU inventory information per warehouse.
This field is only required if the inventory allocation mode for the warehouse is MANUAL. Otherwise, it is optional.

request_body_param.name: ^^^warehouse_id
request_body_param.desc: The warehouse ID. Retrieve this value from the [Get Warehouse List API](650aa418defece02be6e66b6) or Get Inventory Rules API.

request_body_param.name: ^^^quantity
request_body_param.desc:
The SKU quantity available in the warehouse.
Valid range: [1, 999,999]

response_param.name: code
response_param.desc: The success or failure status code returned in API response.

response_param.name: message
response_param.desc: The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.

response_param.name: ^errors
response_param.desc: The list of errors that occurred.

response_param.name: ^^^region
response_param.desc: The target region where the error occurred.

sample_code.label: Go
sample_code.value:
// For more details about the SDK, refer to the documentation:
// https://partner.tiktokshop.com/docv2/page/67c83e0799a75104986ae498
func product202507ReplicateProductPost() {
    configuration := apis.NewConfiguration()
    configuration.AddAppInfo(appKey, appSecret)
    apiClient := apis.NewAPIClient(configuration)
    request := apiClient.ProductV202507API.Product202507ProductsProductIdGlobalReplicatePost(context.Background(), "1729592969712207008")
    request = request.XTtsAccessToken("your access token")
    request = request.ContentType("application/json")
    request = request.ShopCipher("your shop cipher")
    product202507ReplicateProductRequestBody := product_v202507.NewProduct202507ReplicateProductRequestBody()
    product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTarget := product_v202507.NewProduct202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTarget()
    product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTarget.SetRegion("US")
    product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetSkus := product_v202507.NewProduct202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetSkus()
    product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetSkus.SetSourceSkuId("1732057700058170433")
    product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetSkusPrice := product_v202507.NewProduct202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetSkusPrice()
    product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetSkusPrice.SetCurrency("EUR")
    product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetSkusPrice.SetSalePrice("100")
    product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetSkus.SetPrice(*product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetSkusPrice)
    product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetSkusInventory := product_v202507.NewProduct202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetSkusInventory()
    product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetSkusInventory.SetWarehouseId("1732057700058170433")
    product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetSkusInventory.SetQuantity(100)
    product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetSkusInventoryList := []product_v202507.Product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetSkusInventory{*product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetSkusInventory}
    product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetSkus.SetInventory(product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetSkusInventoryList)
    product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetSkusList := []product_v202507.Product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetSkus{*product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetSkus}
    product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTarget.SetSkus(product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetSkusList)
    product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetList := []product_v202507.Product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTarget{*product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTarget}
    product202507ReplicateProductRequestBody.SetReplicateTarget(product202507ReplicateProductRequestBodyReplicateTargetList)
    request = request.Product202507ReplicateProductRequestBody(*product202507ReplicateProductRequestBody)
    resp, httpResp, err := request.Execute()
    if err != nil || httpResp.StatusCode != 200 {
        fmt.Printf("productsRequest err:%v resbody:%s", err, httpResp.Body)
        return
    }
    if resp == nil {
        fmt.Printf("response is nil")
        return
    }
    if resp.GetCode()!= 0 {
        fmt.Printf("response business is error, errorCode:%d errorMessage:%s", resp.GetCode(), resp.GetMessage())
        return
    }
    respDataJson, _ := json.MarshalIndent(resp.GetData(), "", "  ")
    fmt.Println("response data:", string(respDataJson))
    return
}

sample_code.label: Node.js
Java

scope_list.package_description: The Partner will be able to manage seller's product information, by having access to listing of products, to edit product attributes, to change product status and to sync product inventory, etc.
scope_list.auth_info: The Partner will be able to manage your product information, by having access to listing of products, to edit product attributes, to change product status and to sync product inventory, etc.

request_path_param.name: product_id
request_path_param.desc: The product ID in TikTok Shop.
